entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
